commandDescription: Create new scratch org, assigning admin email and issuing login and email with developer credentials
emailFlagDescription: Issue an Email with new org info to the adminemail user
adminEmailFlagDescription: Email address to set as admin - otherwise derived from the devHub user email
numberOfDaysFlagDescription: number of days to keep the org (defaults to 5)
orgAliasFlagDescription: Usful if running locally - the org alias
configFlagDescription: Scratch Org Definition file Path - defaults to ./config/scratch-org-config/project-scratch-def.json
